title: The faces of the COVID   fight across Canada are female  Heres why that matters
description: Women like Theresa Tam and Eileen de Villa could be roles models for other women in the fields of science and medicine
content: At a time when Canadians are thirsty for credible information about all things COVID    a group of female chief medical officers has been thrust into the national spotlight With their unflappable demeanours and personal style  some experts say their new fo    chars
